steps.name: user connects to ebay app using appium server and launch the app
user searchforanitem which s/he wants to buy in search box
the list of searched items are shown on the mobile screen
user selects one of the item
verify information of name/price/description on searchscreen and checkout screen are same

name: Loginto the Ebay Mobile app and search for an Item by verifying the Testdata , screen orientations etc
